Author: EmmettBrooks
EnhancedContent: Lenovo computer, pre-installed Chinese home edition, just activated it, successful, but after restarting, it keeps getting stuck on this update interface, the fan is not running, and the mouse can move.
Title: The computer activation page is stuck on the update interface. What should I do?
Description: Lenovo computer, pre-installed Chinese home edition, just activated it, successful, but after restarting, it keeps getting stuck on this update interface, the fan is not running, and the mouse can move.
